title: Total Divas' Nia Jax calls out Ronda Rousey for being 'disrespectful'
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Total Divas’ Nia Jax called out MMA fighter Ronda Rousey for ‘talking a lot of s**t’ and being ‘disrespectful’.

Ronda taunted WWE Chief Brand Officer Stephanie McMahon as she tried out her ‘bad guy’ persona on Tuesday’s episode of Total Divas.

The MMA fighter had said: ‘We all know I make you too much money for you to fire me and you know it.

‘I have free reign to do anything I want in this ring, because I did everything I could to respect this business. But you know what? No. I am not your dancing monkey, not anymore.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Nia and their peers watching from backstage and seriously did not appreciate Ronda’s attitude.

The WWE crowd, on the other hand, were losing their minds.

‘It doesn’t just take one person to make you a star,’ Nia said during a confessional. ‘You are not the only person in this world. But, for some reason, you think that you can just walk on water and that nobody can touch you.

Nia has no time for haters (Picture: Jon Kopaloff/Getty Images)

Ronda has been feeling like she doesn’t belong in WWE (Picture: Albert L. Ortega/Getty Images)

‘At the WWE, we’re a family. How dare you disrespect all the women who have laid the groundwork for you. No. I’m not gonna frickin’ stand for this.’

Nia didn’t just use the confessional, she made sure her feelings were heard by the former UFC fighter.

She told Ronda: ‘Uh, that’s like disrespectful though,’ to which the fighter replied: ‘I didn’t mean any disrespect.’

In the world of WWE, dramatic clashes like this are expected, but especially when Nia isn’t shy about making sure her opinions are heard.

‘It just seems like I’m constantly offending people because I’m not living by rules that I don’t even know,’ Ronda later said to her husband Travis Browne.

Advertisement

Advertisement

If WWE turns out to be the wrong decision for Ronda, at least she has her great gig going on with FOX’s 9-1-1.

description: Total Divas' Nia Jax got angry with Ronda Rousey for 'talking a lot of s**t' and being 'disrespectful' to the WWE women who made her.
